channel.title: Prenix-World V1 [Delta]
channel.description:
Helllo,
this is prenix world server it is based on deltascape. i am dweardpk = steven owner of prenix world anyways uhmm this is my first release and i am hoping you guys like it for starter and dont *flame * cause i am still trying to bring back the old memorys of deltascape.
Fixed _________ castle war bounty hunter duping 70% im not sure G.E fixed charcter models fixed some custom items. fixed new textures. fixed theving stall. fixed dices. summoning. ingame highscore. and much more just cant remeber......
stuff ima acomplish with Sebb in V2. ________________________
New grahics new emotes tab working skilling new bosses working clipping new loading bar. (the thing were you first run you client saying models and etc.) new minigames. add new jad bosses. new login box. remove allcustom items. add working clan chat. add new map (im not sure if it will be possibel but we will try adding it) add vote system adding vote via add highscore via addd new tabs (inv) add korasi spec add korasi sword. add torva add pernix add allot custom items.. and much more in v2 some will not be done some will....
here are few pics of the server for v1 Bank interface: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/bank.PNG[/img] shop interface: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/shop.PNG[/img] Bounty hunter: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/bounty%20hunter.PNG[/img] Castle wars: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/cw.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/xammy.PNG[/img] item on death: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/death.PNG[/img] Equipment Screen: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/Equipment.PNG[/img] Quest Tab: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/quest%20tab.PNG[/img] Friend list: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/friend.PNG[/img] Ignore list: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/enemy.PNG[/img] Minigame teleport: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/minigame.PNG[/img] Telports: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/Teleport.PNG[/img] Dice: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/dice.PNG[/img] G.E: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/ge.PNG[/img] Thiving: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/thiving.PNG[/img] Shops: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/shop%20place.PNG[/img] Home: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/Prenix-World.PNG[/img] Login: [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/login.PNG[/img]
well these are few pic and such anyways uhmm i hope you like it.
THIS IS RITZSCAPE CLIENT AND orginal DELTA SCAPE.
Client:[URL=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/runefex%20Client.rar]dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/runefex%20Client.rar[/URL]
server:[URL=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/Vectrax%20Source.rar]dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/Vectrax%20Source.rar[/URL]
client/source: [URL=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/Sourceandclient.rar]dl.dropbox.com/u/35463605/Pic/Sourceandclient.rar[/URL]
webclient is already made and im leaving cache there forevers@ :P Steven(me)//20% percent Deltascape(Source) Ritzscape(Client)

item.title: Prenix-World V1 [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:16, topic:440357”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=543033.msg3981420#msg3981420 date=1335311068]

There is so much you can do with delta, i cant see why people hate it.

Because people are too lazy.
[/quote]
I Was going to include that in my post but i had second thoughts, i guess you said it for me
Its True though Everywhere on Runee-serverr i see ‘Delta Will Never Come Back Alive’
My thoughts about that are completely Wrong. People dont understand the truth about Delta, only true coders that put in the time and effort are able to create something as Good as delta[/quote]

Any source or base can be taken and made “good” by a motivated programmer. Delta is poorly written code piled upon poorly written code. A good example of doing this to a base is our Devolution 7.0.

On topic: Could be better, especially your client. Good job, if you did some of this yourself.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ouassim ouassim
item.description:
@ouassim wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:30, topic:440357”][quote author=ouassim link=topic=543033.msg3991786#msg3991786 date=1336686154]
A few questions.

How can i relocate the shops to edgevill and how can i remove the shops.
Whenever i remove or change items the server crashes
[/quote]Two sections; SERVER HELP and SERVER TUTORIALS[/quote]

Well why post it there i’m posting this here because i’m talking about this specific server…
And not the general ones so if someone could give me a use full answer.

EDIT:

I want to change this is it possible ?
So yes how ?

Read full topic

item.title: Prenix-World V1 [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Pblord7, post:22, topic:440357”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=543033.msg3980727#msg3980727 date=1335227224]
Never in my life have I seen someone actually make a webclient ready delta with auto downloading cache. Great job.
[/quote]
Is this a joke[/quote]
Sadly no. Every delta I’ve seen says they are webclient etc, and when I ran it the cache never auto downloaded, nor did the jar work when I made it.

EDIT:
Client.java <It’s a text document, just paste over your current client.java. I fixed the Clan chat errors

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

deadrose91:

i get errors about the clan chat… i don’t know what it is.

Looks like he removed the ClanChatHandler.java

So you can either A) Delete everything for the clan chat system.
or B) Find another delta with clan chat and rip it from there.
